metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms. To create an interactive form, use the tool. See Create a form from an existing document.

The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. You can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form. Acrobat also allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe cloud storage.
Level 1: Beginners. Level 2: Intermediate. Level 3: Advanced. Level 4: Expert. Level 5: Expert level. Level 6: Expert Level. Level 7: Expertlevel. Level 8: ExpertLevel. Level 9: Expert

It allows Internet connections, cross- • domain scripting, silent printing, external-object references, and import/export methodology operations on certified documents. It’s prudent to select this option only when necessary on certificates you trust.

Advanced Authoring can be enabled by selecting the toggle in the upper right corner. Checkbox places fields anywhere you click on the document. Allows resizing of fields by clicking the bottom right corner of the field (blue) and dragging the field to size.
